description.message: Strips away clutter like buttons, background images, and changes the page's text size, contrast and layout for better readability

rd_screenshot.message: Take a screenshot from the current view (command)

rd_save.message:
Save a copy in HTML format (command)

Use Alt key to exclude notes
Use Shift key to convert to MarkDown

rd_design.message:
Toggle design mode (command)

When active, you can edit the document or delete elements like MS word

Ctrl/Command + B: Toggles bold on/off for the selection or at the insertion point.
Ctrl/Command + I: Toggles italics on/off for the selection or at the insertion point.
Ctrl/Command + U: Toggles underline on/off for the selection or at the insertion point.

rd_speech.message:
Read this Article (command)
To start from middle, select starting word, then press this button

rd_note.message: Add a new persistent sticky note (command)

rd_highlight.message:
Toggle highlight (command)

These highlights are persistent until the browser restart

rd_stm.message: Show all articles in this document

rd_sts.message: Only show the main article in this document

rd_warning_1.message: Reader's content is not available anymore. Switching back to the original page in a few seconds...

bg_warning_1.message: Sorry, this page cannot be converted!

bg_converting.message: Conversion starts when the page finishes loading...
